original_title: 本当にあった怨霊恐怖動画13
overview: Numerous "things that shouldn't be shown" and "things that shouldn't be shown" captured by everyday images. Is it a warning to us from the spirit world? Or is it a warning of a curse? These are some of the psychic videos and photos that were posted to a video production company. Such contributors are almost always plagued by strange events.
tagline: You may have already stepped into a realm you should not step into...
title: Real Vengeful Ghost Horror Video 13
